task.title: Expanding the Navigator in Increments
task.shortdesc: More indicators in the Navigator keep the tree compact. Click the indicator to open that branch of the tree. You can specify how many items to expand at one time.

keywords.indexterm: Expanding the Navigator in incrementsExpanding Child Items at the platform level of the Navigator

context.p: When clicking Expand on a Navigator branch of more than, by default, 25 child items, you are prompted to enter the number to expand at one time.

step.cmd: Set the number of items to expand:

substep.cmd: If the Expand child items window is not open, right-click the Navigator item whose child items you want to expand incrementally and click Expand .
Enter the number to expand and click OK to open that number of child items.
Click Morewhen you want to open the next group of child items.

step.info: You can expand all the child items of a Navigator item. The entire branch does not expand, just the children of the selected item. If the Expand child items window is not open, right-click the Navigator item whose child items you want to expand and click Expand Child Items.
